Welcome!

My name is Kelle Clark, and I am a Mathematics and Computer Science enthusiast. This site allows me to journal my exploration into these fields, catelog great resources and share my ideas with others.

Navigate to either my TIE (Today I Explored) blog-like page or visit the Projects page to view samples of my work.




Your feedback and suggestions are welcome for topics for me to look into. Email me at clarkke20@students.ecu.edu
